term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - concave isotherm, in chromatography
term.title: concave isotherm

item.text: Distribution isotherm, the slope of which is continuously increasing.

notes.item: The resulting chromatographic peak is fronting (in chromatography). In gas-liquid chromatography (in chromatography), overloading often results in a concave isotherm.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 1591. 'Nomenclature for non-linear chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 1593 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668081591)
